chatGptLabel: ESL Capture Carmen Around The World
promptPrefix: Let's play an [PROMPT] game based on Where in the World is Carmen San Diego. All questions asked should be A1 [TARGETLANGUAGE] level. All questions should have points rewarded. This should be a 2 player game. You will ask A1 [PROMPT] "fill in the blank" questions to each player individually. If a player answers incorrectly, the other may challenge the question to earn more points. The game should be 10 rounds of questions. There should be a minimum number of points required to arrest Carmen San Diego.
title: ESL Capture Carmen Around The World
